actions.name: Periodic Orbit

cost.trigger: The user's next Activation after resolving Wish, Future Sight, or Doom Desire.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user's next Activation after resolving Wish, Future Sight, or Doom Desire.

Effect: The user freely resolves the attack once more. Periodic Orbit cannot be activated in response to another resolution resulting from a previous Activation of Periodic Orbit.

actions.name: Doom Desire
actions.description: Effect: When this attack is declared, the user rolls to hit valid target(s) at the start of the user's first Activation in the following Round.
